short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically defaults old.reddit to show 500 comments before the page loads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I was tired of having to press an extra button when loading a post on Reddit with more than 200 comments so I made this extension that automatically loads 500 comments.

This only works on the old version of Reddit, not the redesign.
